RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 15700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Four Races Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DING DING sprinted clear early to race in hand, and widened its lead through the lane under steady pressure. ADABEL was off slowly, moved up from the inside around the far turn through the stretch and got up for the place position late. SAFE REEZAN chased the top pair early on, raced three wide around the far turn and kept on to the wire. WOLF CREEK PASS was hustled along throughout and weakened the final furlong while racing two to three wide. MY EXPENSIVE GIFT was off a step slow, raced near the inside around the far turn, shifted five wide into the upper stretch and had not enough. HURRICANE DIRECTOR was off a step slow, raced three wide in the lane and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Adabel
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, inside turn, inside lane, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Hurricane Director
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, 3 wide lane, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: My Expensive Gift
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, 5wd upper stretch, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,000 1 lb. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAR'S ESTATE was sent clear to set the early pace and raced well clear to be a handy winner under a mild hand ride. A GREAT AFFAIR chased the early pace, raced three to four wide around the far turn and got up for the place position. MIO GRACELAND chased the early pace along the inside and kept on to the wire. ORANGEBURG was hustled along throughout, raced two to three deep around the far turn and raced evenly in the stretch run. YDOUHAVETOBESOMEAN was off slowly, saved ground and never threatened. ROCKING TO HOME was shuffled back at the start, raced off the early going and had no response. MEGALODON'SREVENGE dropped back early, raced five deep into the upper stretch and lacked a bid.

ENTRY.NAME: Mio Graceland
ENTRY.OWNER: A and B Racing Stable LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Megalodon'srevenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5wd upper stretch, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Bear's Estate
ENTRY.OWNER: Wilson Rayan and Knoblauch Michelle R
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, well clear, mild hand ride

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Elex Dale Bowman & Christine Bowman White

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 33900. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 12 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Co nsidered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIBER STRONG pressed the early leader from the outside, took command through the far turn and held safe under strong handling. AMIDSHIPS was forced to check at the start, rushed up from the outside to contention, was in aim through the upper stretch and finished game after the troubling beginning. DERBY DAY DREAMS veered in at the start, bothered foes at the break, raced three to four wide around the far turn from the outside of rivals, was six deep into the upper stretch and closed in belatedly. Jockey of Drinkwithethestars claimed an objection for interference and stewards disqualified Derby Day Dreams and placed seventh. SUPER JORDAN vied for the early lead from the inside and weakened. FROGGY THE GREMLIN was hustled throughout, raced near the rail and had not enough. BOSS E BOOGS was bumped hard at the start, raced two wide around the far turn through the stretch and never threatened. DRINKWITHTHESTARS was forced to take up sharply at the break, raced far back and was moved up to sixth place through objection.

ENTRY.NAME: Froggy the Gremlin
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, rail bid, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Drinkwiththestars
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced take up sharply break, far back,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Derby Day Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in break, bothered foes, outside, late bid

ENTRY.NAME: Fiber Strong
ENTRY.OWNER: Pascal Lawrence J and Harding Sr Philip Arthur

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 38700. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER SINCE JULY 12, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since De cember 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 12 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).

CLAIM.OWNER: Brown Ronney W and Cefalu John

RACE.FOOTNOTES: NICO pressed the pace from the outside to foes while racing three deep and finished strongly to be well clear late under steady pressure. AUBURN MILL was sent along early to set the early pace along the inside, was overtaken through the far turn, kept on but was no match for the winner. ROCKET APPEAL pressed the early pace while racing two wide between rivals and weakened through the stretch run. OUT OF CENTS chased the early pace from the inside, shifted four into the upper stretch and raced even with no rally. BOASTER settled near the back of the pack early on, made a four to five wide bid in the lane and had not enough. BUFF'S EYE VIEW dropped back early, saved ground and lacked a bid. MISSIONSNINETYNINE raced mid pack early on, was near the rail into the upper stretch and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Buff's Eye View
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Cents
ENTRY.OWNER: Coleswood Farm Inc and G L M Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Boaster
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, 4-5 wide bid, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Nico
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3wd outside foes, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Missionsninetynine
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, inside upper stretch, no bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,000 1 lb. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Co nsidered In Weight Allowances) NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: A GOOD LAW pressed the pace from the outside of foe early on, took command, dug in deep stretch and prevailed under all out pressure in a determined run. DIAL HER rated along early, moved up to challenge through the far turn, raced three wide in the lane and finished gamely to the wire. CUMULONIMBUS dropped back off the early pace, moved up four to five wide and finished willingly to the wire. DECISIVE CAUSE settled off the early pace along the inside, moved up through the far turn but had not enough in the drive. FORT ZANNA dropped back early, raced near the inside and had no final bid. ULTIMATE BREEZE raced mid pack early, was four to five wide around the far turn and never threatened. CHANNEL SCENT stalked the pace, raced three to four wide around the far turn and failed to sustain a bid. SUPERSTASIA showed early foot from the inside faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Zanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, no final bid

ENTRY.NAME: Ultimate Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4-5 wide far turn, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Channel Scent
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3-4 wide, failed to sustain bid,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36300. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since D ecember 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 12 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAYTOWN FROSTY dueled for the early lead while racing outside of rivals and finished well to prove best under strong handling. FULLY CONNECTED dueled for the early lead along the rail and finished gamely to the wire. NEWS FLASH chased the early pace while being coaxed on, raced three wide around the far turn and showed good late energy to move up late. GOLDEN KEY dueled for the early lead while racing between rivals and weakened a bit late. INSIDE RISK was hustled along throughout, raced two wide between, experienced traffic near the sixteenth pole and kept on. CAIRO CALLING stumbled at the break, chased the early pace and weakened a bit after the troubling beginning. STRONG FIBER hustled along, raced near the inside and had no response. BAYTOWN WARRIOR saved ground and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Warrior
ENTRY.OWNER: McEntee Racing Inc and Resolute Racing Alliance LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Baytown Frosty
ENTRY.OWNER: McEntee Racing Inc and Resolute Racing Alliance LLC

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. R D Holder, Tony Holmes & Dr. & Mrs. Walter Zent

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winner s Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 12 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY LOVELY GIRL hustled along early, made a four wide through the far turn and finished well to get up under strong handling. ALPINE MOON dropped back early, moved up five wide from the outside of foes and closed in well late. BANDITS WARRIOR vied for the early lead along the rail and gave way late grudgingly. REIGN ON AND ON vied for the early lead while racing between rivals and weakened. CANVAS ART was off a step slow, saved ground and had no response. AYKIZ vied for the lead from the outside of rivals and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Canvas Art
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, saved ground, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 16900. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 12, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Ent ered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDIANA RED rated early on, moved up to challenge from the outside of foe near the quarter pole while racing in the two pace and forged clear late under strong encouragement. INSTIGATED coaxed along early, raced near the inside around the far turn, angled four to five wide and finished gamely to the wire. JACK THE RIPPER (FR) showed good early foot from the inside and gave way grudgingly. MY CANDY BIZ hustled along early, raced from the inside past the quarter pole and was even late with no late run. LOST IN MANHATTAN dropped back off the early pace, was five deep into the upper stretch and lacked a rally. MONGOLIAN HERO settled off the early going, raced along the inside into the upper stretch and never threatened. COMPOUND IT was coaxed along from the outside of rivals and faded. U ROCK IT threw his head at the break, raced four deep near the five sixteenths pole and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Lost in Manhattan
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 5wd upper stretch, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Instigated
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed, inside far turn, shifted 4-5 wide, game

ENTRY.NAME: Mongolian Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, inside upper, no bid
